full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA BRTEN NAS PHYAG DANG MCHOD PA 'BUL TSUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DAM PA BES RGYA SPRUL PA'I SKU RIN PO CHE NAS NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, ^GSER KHANG RI KHROD PAS BRAG DKAR BDE LDAN GLING NAS SBYAR @008B BA'O, ,DAD LDAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG BSTAN DAR GYIS, ,PHA MAS THOG DRANGS MA RGAN 'GRO BA KUN, ,MYUR DU BLA MED BYANG CHEN THOB PHYIR DU, ,SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU DPAR DU BSGRUBS, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, DGE'O, ,)
